doc:
Mackenzie Crook https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mackenzie_Crook 0 Paul James Crook (born 29 September 1971), known professionally as Mackenzie Crook, is an English actor, director, comedian and BAFTA-winning writer. He is best known for playing Gareth Keenan in The Office, Ragetti in the Pirates of the Caribbean films, and Orell in the HBO series Game of Thrones, and is the creator and star of BBC Four's Detectorists. Paul_James_Crook ( born_29_September_1971 ) , known professionally as Mackenzie_Crook , is an_English_actor , director , comedian and BAFTA-winning_writer .
